tgt_text: UGq Nyameko Barney Pityana njengoSihlalo we-National Lotteries Commission..     U-Adv Rory Voller njengoMkhomishinari we-Companies and Intellectual Property Commission.

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: Energy.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.

src_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.
tgt_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.

src_text: In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..
tgt_text: In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..

src_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.
tgt_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.

src_text: Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.

src_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.
tgt_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.

src_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).
tgt_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauteng.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed outrage at the recent brutal rape of eight women in Krugersdorp in Gauteng.

src_text: These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabric.
tgt_text: These vile acts and abuse against women undermine our social fabric.

src_text: Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of number of suspects in connection with the heinous crime..
tgt_text: Cabinet further commended the South African Police Service for their swift arrest of number of suspects in connection with the heinous crime..

src_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activities.
tgt_text: Cabinet appealed to communities to work with law-enforcement agencies by sharing any information or reporting suspicious activities.

src_text: Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and children..  Every South African has duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the law.
tgt_text: Working together, we can make our communities safer for women and children..  Every South African has duty to act against perpetrators of violence within the ambit of the law.

src_text: Report all GBVF-related incidents to local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150.  .
tgt_text: Report all GBVF-related incidents to local police station or call the toll-free Crime Stop number: 0860 01 0111, the National GBVF Command Centre: 0800 428 428 or Stop Gender Violence Helpline: 0800 150.  .

src_text: Women’s Month.
tgt_text: Women’s Month.

src_text: The annual Women’s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our society..
tgt_text: The annual Women’s Month in August pays tribute to women who participated in the liberation struggle and all women in our society..

src_text: This year’s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme: “Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..
tgt_text: This year’s Women Month is being celebrated under the theme: “Women’s Socio-Economic Rights and Empowerment: Building Back Better for Women’s Improved Resilience”..

src_text: The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains key priority in democratic South Africa.
tgt_text: The over 20 000 women who marched to the Union Buildings in Pretoria on 9 August 1956 contributed to ensuring that gender equality and empowerment remains key priority in democratic South Africa.

src_text: Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in.
tgt_text: Their brave actions inspired women in general to take their rightful place in Parliament, government and civil society, and we are constantly building on these advances since gaining freedom in.

src_text: Marikana commemoration.
tgt_text: Marikana commemoration.

src_text: On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in.
tgt_text: On Tuesday, 16 August 2022, government joined the rest of the country in remembering the tragedy that unfolded at Marikana in North West in.

src_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our history..
tgt_text: The pain felt by the workers, their families and the nation at large would forever be entrenched in our history..

src_text: The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana community.
tgt_text: The Marikana Renewal Programme has been implemented to rebuild and create an enabling environment to improve the lives of the Marikana community.

src_text: Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this year R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housing.
tgt_text: Last year government paid R176 million in compensation to the families of the victims and the remaining cases under litigation are expected to be finalised by the end of August number of renovated or newly acquired houses have been handed to the Marikana widows and others will be completed this year R700-million housing project will see mineworkers being provided with decent housing.

src_text: Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communities.
tgt_text: Critical social infrastructure is being provided to improve the living conditions of mining communities.

src_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng.
tgt_text: District Development Model (DDM) Presidential Imbizo in Gauteng.

src_text: Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August..
tgt_text: Following the success of the previous three DDM Presidential Izimbizo hosted in North West, Free State and Mpumalanga respectively, the Sedibeng District Municipality in Gauteng hosted the fourth instalment on Friday, 12 August..

src_text: Under the theme: “Leave no one behind”, President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local governments.
tgt_text: Under the theme: “Leave no one behind”, President Cyril Ramaphosa led the delegation of senior officials from the national, provincial and local governments.

src_text: South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic conditions..
tgt_text: South Africans in their various formations and sectors were mobilised to act together against rising levels of poverty and destitution caused by the challenging economic conditions..

src_text: The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and country.
tgt_text: The Sedibeng District has made progress in operationalising the Vaal River Special Economic Zone (SEZ), which holds potential for the reindustrialisation of the region, province and country.

src_text: The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing sector.
tgt_text: The Vaal River SEZ plans to host the following critical sectors: The new Vaal River Smart City; Green Hydrogen Innovation Hub; cannabis hub; agro-logistics; aerotropolis; aerodrome; air freight and the revitalised steel manufacturing sector.

src_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.
tgt_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.

src_text: The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..
tgt_text: The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..

src_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..
tgt_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..

src_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.
tgt_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementation.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan for implementation.

src_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..
tgt_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..

src_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the space.

src_text: It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international markets..

src_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.
tgt_text: Updated Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.

src_text: Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the amendments to the current Policy Framework for Municipal Borrowing and Financial Emergencies.

src_text: The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.
tgt_text: The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.

src_text: Amongst the amendments   proposed introducing longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being financed.
tgt_text: Amongst the amendments   proposed introducing longer-term borrowing period to match the useful lifespan of some of the assets being financed.

src_text: The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.
tgt_text: The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.

src_text: Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditure.
tgt_text: Section 230 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 empowers municipalities to raise loans for their capital or current expenditure.

src_text: The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).
tgt_text: The original framework was approved by Cabinet in 2000 to guide Chapter 6 and 13 of the Municipal Finance Act, 2003 (Act 56 of 2003).

src_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.
tgt_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats release.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the quarterly crime stats release.

src_text: This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the country.
tgt_text: This was to change the previous annual release of the crime stats for the country.

src_text: The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.
tgt_text: The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.

src_text: Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).
tgt_text: Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).

src_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..

src_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July.
tgt_text: The NSoD lapsed on 18 August 2022 following its extension on 18 July.

src_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected provinces..

src_text: Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultation.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultation.

src_text: The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.

src_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.
tgt_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.

src_text: This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownership..  National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of.
tgt_text: This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownership..  National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.

src_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.
tgt_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.

src_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.
tgt_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.

src_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.
tgt_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.

src_text: The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
tgt_text: The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).

src_text: The agency will take on the functions that are currently performed by the Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: The agency will take on the functions that are currently performed by the Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.

src_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).
tgt_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).

src_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalities.
tgt_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalities.

src_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectively.
tgt_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectively.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultation..  Financial Matters Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultation..  Financial Matters Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.

src_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).
tgt_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).

src_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.
tgt_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.

src_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.
tgt_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.

src_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.
tgt_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.

src_text: The Bill was published for public comment in February.
tgt_text: The Bill was published for public comment in February.

src_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).
tgt_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).

src_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).
tgt_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).

src_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.
tgt_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.

src_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.
tgt_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.

src_text: South Africa has been member of FATF since.
tgt_text: South Africa has been member of FATF since.

tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.

src_text: The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..
tgt_text: The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..

src_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.
tgt_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.

src_text: In 2020, the Constitutional Court declared Section 63 of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act of 1992 unconstitutional and suspended the invalidity to 17 December 2022 to provide for Parliament to correct the defect  Upcoming Event.
tgt_text: In 2020, the Constitutional Court declared Section 63 of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act of 1992 unconstitutional and suspended the invalidity to 17 December 2022 to provide for Parliament to correct the defect  Upcoming Event.

src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuhla kancinci kwezinga labantu abangaphangeliyo kweli lizwe, nelihle nge-.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the slight decline in the country’s unemployment rate, which dropped by.
tgt_text: 6%, lisuka kuma-.

src_text: 6 percent, from.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala laya kutsho kuma-.

src_text: 5% in the first quarter to.

src_text: 9 percent in the second quarter of.
tgt_text: Amanani apapashwe kwiiNkcukacha-manani zoMzantsi Afrika zoPhando lweKota lwezaBasebenzi abonisa ukuba eyona nzuzo inkulu ibonakale kwiiNkonzo zoLuntu nezeNtlalo (276 000), kuRhwebo (169 000), kwezeMali (128 000) kunye nakuLwakhiwo (104 000).

src_text: The figures published in the Quarterly Labour Force Survey by Statistics South Africa show that the biggest job gains were recorded in Community and Social Services (276 000), Trade (169 000), Finance (128 000) and Construction (104 000)..
tgt_text: Inani labantu abasebenzayo bebonke limi kwi-.

src_text: The total number of employed persons stood at 15, 6 million in the second quarter of 2022, and the number of unemployed persons increased by 132 000 to 8, 0 million in the second quarter of 2022 compared to the previous quarter.
tgt_text: 6 lezigidi kwikota yesibini ka-2022, kwaye inani labantu abangasebenziyo linyuke nge-132 000 ukuya kwisi-.

src_text: These modest yet impressive gains show that the concerted efforts by government and its social partners to grow the economy and create much-needed jobs are beginning to bear fruit..
tgt_text: 0 sezigidi kwikota yesibini ka-2022 xa kuthelekiswa nekota yangaphambili.

src_text: This is testament to the fact that if we all work together by harnessing our collective strengths, we can overcome the challenges facing our economy..
tgt_text: Ezi nzuzo zincinci kodwa zincomekayo zibonisa ukuba iinzame ezidityanelweyo zikarhulumente kunye namahlakani akhe kwezentlalo okukhulisa uqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi efuneka ngamandla ziyaqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of South Africans as they struggle to go about their daily lives owing to the cost of living and high unemployment rate.
tgt_text: Obu bubungqina bokuba xa sinosebenzisana sisonke sisebenzise amandla ethu ahlangeneyo, singayoyisa imingeni ejongene noqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: As caring government, we remain determined and committed to working together with our social partners to build better tomorrow for everyone.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabemi boMzantsi Afrika njengoko besokola ukuqhubeka nobomi babo ngenxa yeendleko zokuphila kunye nentswela-ngqesho ephezulu.

src_text: Government remains committed to supporting local businesses by buying local goods and services.
tgt_text: Njengorhulumente okhathalayo, sizimisele ukusebenzisana namahlakani ethu kwezentlalo ukwakha ingomso elingcono lomntu wonke.

src_text: Public infrastructure.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazimisele ukuxhasa amashishini asekuhlaleni ngokuthenga iimpahla kunye neenkonzo zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Cabinet condemned the destruction of infrastructure by Tongaat residents in KwaZulu-Natal during protest over access to water.
tgt_text: Iziseko zophuhliso zoluntu.

src_text: Cabinet called for calm and patience as work is underway to restore the Tongaat Water Treatment Works.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugxekile ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso ngabahlali base-Tongaat KwaZulu-Natal ngexesha loqhankqalazo befuna amanzi.
IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo lokuzola kunye nomonde njengoko uqhuba umsebenzi wokubuyisela iMisebenzi yokuCocwa kwaManzi ase-Tongaat.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of residents who have had to use water tankers for an extended period since the flooding earlier this year.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabahlali ekuye kwafuneka ukuba basebenzise iitanki zamanzi ukusukela oko kwabakho izikhukula ebutsheni balo nyaka.

src_text: However, violence and anarchy are not solution, and the destruction of public infrastructure only hurts local communities.
tgt_text: Nangona kunjalo, ubundlobongela kunye neziphithiphithi azisosisombululo, kwaye ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso kulimaza kuphela uluntu.

src_text: Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act of.
tgt_text: UMthetho oLungisiweyo kwiiNkqubo zikaMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya wama-.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the signed into law the Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act, 2022 (Act 3 of 2022) by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele uMthetho oYilwayo weeNkqubo zooMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya, wama-2022 (uMthetho 3 wama-2022) otyikityiweyo nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: The Act aims to improve the capacity and ethical standards of local government.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ujolise ekuphuculeni amandla kunye nemigangatho yeendlela zokuziphatha zikarhulumente wamakhaya.

src_text: The law forms part of government’s efforts to professionalise the Public Service and ensure the sustainable provision of services to the people, as basic right enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of..
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyinxalenye yamalinge karhulumente okwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente yenziwe ngobuchule kwaye iqinisekise ukubonelela ngeenkonzo okuzinzileyo ebantwini, njengelungelo elisisiseko eliqulathwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika we-..

src_text: The Act specifies the processes to be followed for senior position appointments.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uchaza iinkqubo emazilandelwe xa kuqeshwa kwizikhundla eziphezulu.

src_text: It now prevents senior public officials from holding political office in political parties.
tgt_text: Ngoku uthintela amagosa aphezulu karhulumente ekubeni abe nezikhundla zopolitiko kumaqela ezopolitiko.

src_text: Also with this Act in place, vacant municipal manager posts are expected to be advertised nationally to attract wide pool of suitable candidates..
tgt_text: Kananjalo kulo Mthetho ukhoyo, izithuba zoomanejala boomasipala ezingenabantu kulindeleke ukuba zipapashwe kuzwelonke ukutsala iqela elibanzi labagqatswa abafanelekileyo.

src_text: Cabinet is confident that these changes will ensure that those who are appointed or elected into these positions will be able to deliver on their promises so that we can achieve better life for all.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba olu tshintsho luza kuqinisekisa ukuba abo banyuliweyo okanye abanyulwe kwezi zikhundla baya kukwazi ukuphumeza izithembiso zabo ukuze wonke umntu azuze ubomi obungcono.

src_text: Crime.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Cabinet commended the South African Revenue Service’s customs officials for seizing 785 kg of crystal meth with street value of R236 million at the OR Tambo International Airport on Sunday, 28 August.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi income amagosa eNkonzo yeRhafu yoMzantsi Afrika ngokuthimba i-785 kg ye-crystal meth enexabiso lasesitratweni lezigidi ezingama-R236 kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya i-OR Tambo International ngeCawe, umhla wama-28 kweyeThupha wama-.

src_text: The drug bust will send clear warning to criminal syndicates that our ports of entry and exit are well protected and our officers are working hard to stamp out any criminality   Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Ukubhaqwa kweziyobisi kuya kuthumela isilumkiso esicacileyo kumaqela abophuli-mthetho ukuba amazibuko ethu okungena kunye nawokuphuma akhuselwe kakuhle kwaye amagosa ethu asebenza nzima ukuphelisa naluphi na ulwaphulo-mthetho     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Report of the Council on Higher Education (CHE) Enquiry into the Remuneration of University Vice Chancellors and Senior Executive Managers in South Africa.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeBhunga leMfundo ePhakamileyo (i-CHE) ngoMvuzo weeSekela-Tshansela zeeYunivesithi kunye naBaphathi abaPhezulu abaLawulayo eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed on the outcomes of the CHE enquiry that was commissioned in 2020 by the Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation, Dr Blade Nzimande, to examine the remuneration levels and trends of the university executives over the 15-year period from 2005 to..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe amagqabantshintshi ngeziphumo zophando lwe-CHE olwagunyaziswa ngowama-2020 nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi kunye noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha, uGq Blade Nzimande, ukuze kuphononongwe amanqanaba emivuzo kunye neendlela zabaphathi beeyunivesithi kwisithuba seminyaka eli-15 ukusuka ngowama-2005 ukuya kutsho kowama-..     Uphando ibikukumisela uzinzo, ukusebenza kunye nophuhliso lweeyunivesithi okanye icandelo lemfundo ephakamileyo kweli lizwe.

src_text: The investigation was to establish the sustainability, viability and development of the universities or higher education sector in the country.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ichaza iziphumo eziphambili kunye nezindululo zokulungisa.

src_text: This report outlines the key findings together with proposed remedial recommendations..
tgt_text: Izindululo ziphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, inkqubo yomvuzo eqinisiweyo kunye nephandle.

src_text: The recommendations propose, amongst others strengthened and more transparent remuneration process.
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kwesigqeba sokujonga sangaphandle kwaye nesizimeleyo ukojonga inkqubo yokwenziwa kwezigqibo zemivuzo.

src_text: The setting up of an external and independent oversight structure to oversee the decision-making process of remunerations.
tgt_text: Zikwaphakamisa nokuqiniswa kweenkqubo zovavanyo lomsebenzi kumaziko.

src_text: It also proposes the strengthening of the performance evaluation systems in the institutions.
tgt_text: Uphononongo lukwathathele ingqalelo ubungakanani bala maziko kwaye lwenza nokulinganisa lujonga kumazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: The study has also taken into account the various sizes of these institutions and it also did international benchmarking.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa weMfundo ePhakamileyo, iNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kulindeleke ukuba axoxe ngale ngxelo neenkokeli zeyunivesithi njengenyathelo lokomeleza la maziko emfundo.

src_text: The Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation is expected to discuss this report with the university leadership as measure to strengthen these academic institutions.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iya kuthi emva koko ipapashwe kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho: www.dhet.gov.za..     INguqu eKhawulezayo yoPhando kunye neSakhono sokuFundisa kwiCandelo leMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: The report will thereafter be published in the Department of Higher Education and Training’s website: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izixhasile izindululo zamaphononongo amabini awayegunyaziswe ukuba acebise ngamanyathelo aza kuthathwa ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu yophando kunye nesakhono sokufundisa kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: Accelerated Transformation of the Research and Teaching Capacity in the Higher Education Sector.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yokuqala yenziwe liQela laBaphathiswa eliSebenzayo elaphanda ngemiqobo ethintela ukuqeshwa, ukugcinwa kunye nokuqhubela phambili kwezifundiswa ezimnyama zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Cabinet supported the recommendations of the two studies that were commissioned to advise on the measures to be put in place so as to accelerate the transformation of research and teaching capacity in the institutions of higher learning.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesibini – egunyaziswe liSebe lezeNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kunye neSiseko soPhando lweSizwe – yenziwe yi-Universities South Africa, iqumrhu elimele iiyunivesithi zoluntu ezingama-26 kweli lizwe.

src_text: The first report was done by the Ministerial Task Team which investigated the blockages that prevent the recruitment, retention and progression of black South African academics.
tgt_text: Zombini ezi ngxelo zinikeze ngamacebo ongenelelo ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu kwimimandla emihlanu ebanzi, esebefumene isidanga sokuqala; ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabasebenzi; inkcubeko kunye nokusebenza kweziko; umgaqo-nkqubo nesicwangciso, kunye nezibonelelo ezingqongopheleyo..     ISivumelwano saMazwe ngaMazwe ngeMithombo Yemfuza yeZityalo zoKutya kunye nezoLimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: The second report – commissioned by the Department of Science and Innovation and the National Research Foundation – was done by Universities South Africa, the umbrella body representative of the 26 public universities in the country.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePalamente.

src_text: Both these reports proposes intervention strategies to accelerate transformation in five broad areas, namely in postgraduate pineline; staff participation; institutional culture and practice; policy and the strategy, and limited resources.
tgt_text: Oku kuya kwenza ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ube yinxalenye yamaqela esi Sivumelwano, nesikhokela amazwe angamalungu ekulondolozeni kunye nasekuqinisekiseni usetyenziso oluzinzileyo lwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo ekutyeni nakwezolimo.

Ukungena kwesi siVumelwano kuya komeleza ukuzibophelela kwelizwe ngokubhekiselele kulondolozo kunye nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo, kwaye sinike inkxaso kuluntu lwasemaphandleni.

src_text: International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (the Treaty).
tgt_text: ISicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo soMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Treaty to Parliament for accession.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iSicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: This will enable South Africa to form part of the parties to this Treaty, which guides the member countries in conserving and ensuring the sustainable usage of the plant genetic resources for food and agriculture.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonisa umbono okwabelwana ngawo woMzantsi Afrika olinganayo, nokwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Acceding to this Treaty will also strengthen the country’s commitment towards conservation and sustainable use of plant genetic resources, and provide support to rural communities.
tgt_text: Sichaza imigaqo kunye neendawo kumgaqo-nkqubo zokuphumeza oku.

src_text: Just Transition Framework for South Africa.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo senguqu siza kuchaphazela wonke umntu waseMzantsi Afrika, sinike ithuba lokulungisa ukungalingani okwenziwa yimbali kwaye sidale uqoqosho oluxhamlisa wonke umntu.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Just Transition Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: IKomishoni kaMongameli yeMozulu iqhube inkqubo yothethathethwano ebanzi kunye namahlakani ezentlalo yaze yafumana inkxaso ebanzi ngesi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: The framework presents shared vision for an equitable, climate-resilient South Africa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba inguqu eya kuqoqosho olungenayo ikhabhoni ngowama-2050 kufuneka ixhase iminqweno yophuhliso lwesizwe, kuqukwe imisebenzi endilisekileyo kumntu wonke, ubandakanyo lwentlalo kunye nokupheliswa kwentlupheko.

src_text: It defines the principles and policy areas to achieve this.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuwo onke amahlakani ezentlalo ukuba axhase aze amkele esi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: The transition framework will impact everyone in South Africa, and provides an opportunity to address historical inequities and creates an economy that benefits all.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso esineenkcukacha zokuphumeza esi sicwangciso-nkqubo siya kuphuhliswa, kwaye sidityaniswe kwinkqubo yocwangciso kunye neyohlahlo lwabiwo-mali karhulumente.

src_text: The Presidential Climate Commission conducted an extensive consultation process with social partners and received broad support for the framework.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha leLayisenisi yokuQhuba yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed that the shift to net-zero carbon economy by 2050 must support national development aspirations, including decent work for all, social inclusion and the eradication of poverty.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume ukutshintshwa kweKhadi leLayisensi yokuQhuba elikhoyo ngoku lize lifakwe kwelinye elineempawu ezikhuselekileyo.

src_text: Cabinet has called on all social partners to rally behind and embrace this framework detailed implementation plan for the framework will be developed, and it will be integrated into the government planning and budgeting system.
tgt_text: Le nkqubo yangoku oko yayisebenza ukusukela ngo-.

src_text: New South African Driving Licence Card.
tgt_text: Ubuchwephesha ukusukela ngoko sebatshintsha kwaye kuya kuxabisa kakhulu ukugcina iziseko zophuhliso ezikhoyo .

src_text: Cabinet approved the replacement of the current Driving Licence Card to one with more secure design features..
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha elicetywayo liya kwenza ilayisenisi yokuqhuba yeli lizwe ihambelane ne-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving License (i-ISO18013).

src_text: The current system has been in operation since.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weNkqubo eYandisiweyo yeMisebenzi kaRhulumente (i-EPWP).

src_text: The technology has since evolved and it is becoming expensive to maintain the current infrastructure.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente loMgaqo-nkqubo oyilwayo we-EPWP ukuze uluntu lubonisane ngawo.

src_text: The new proposed card will make the country’s driving licence compatible with the International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).
tgt_text: I-EPWP yenye yeenkqubo eziphambili zikarhulumente ezijolise ekuboneleleni ukuthomalalisa intlupheko kunye nokuzisa ingeniso ngokudala amathuba emisebenzi ethutyana, ingakumbi kulutsha kunye nabasetyhini.

src_text: Expanded Public Works Programme (EPWP) Policy.
tgt_text: Uyilo lomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha luza komeleza le nkqubo kwaye lunike ingcaciso kwimiba efana nemivuzo, imodeli yenkxaso-mali kunye nokhuseleko loluntu, kwaye lulungelelanise i-EPWP neendlela zokusebenza zale mihla.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the draft EPWP Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Luza kukhuthaza intsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente kunye necandelo labucala ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekudalweni kwemisebenzi endilisekileyo kunye nokuphelisa intlupheko.

src_text: The EPWP is one of government's key programmes aimed at providing poverty and income relief by creating temporary work opportunities, particularly for youth and women..
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kukhuthaza ukusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ekuphunyezweni kweenkqubo zemisebenzi yoluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: The draft new policy will strengthen the programme and provide clarity on aspects such as wages, funding model and social protection, and also align the EPWP with modern labour practices.
tgt_text: Izilungiso kuLuhlu lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: It will promote partnerships between government and the private sector toward ensuring the EPWP contributes massively towards the creation of decent work and alleviation of poverty.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele umyinge, uyilo kunye noqulunqo lonyaka wama-2023 lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: The policy will also promote innovation in the implementation of public works programmes across the country..
tgt_text: Ivume inkqubo ejikelezayo qho ngonyaka yokusetyenziswa kweelwimi ezisemthethweni kuluhlu lwesine lweemali ezinkozo.

src_text: Amendments to the Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Igama elithi “uMzantsi Afrika” liya kufakwa kwelinye icala kwimali eyinkozo ze libhalwe ngazo zonke iilwimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the dimension, design and compilation of the year 2023 Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Iilwimi ezintathu ziya kusetyenziswa kwi-R5; iilwimi ezimbini kwi-R2; i-50c, i-20c, i-10c kunye ne-R1 ziya kuba ngolwimi olunye.

src_text: It approved the annual rotational system of the usage of the official languages on the fourth decimal coin series.
tgt_text: Zonke ezi lwimi ziya kusetyenziswa ngendlela ejikeleziswayo rhoqo ngonyaka kule minyaka ili-10 izayo.

src_text: The word “South Africa” will be inserted on the one side of the coins and printed in all the official languages.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo oDityanisiweyo woLawulo loMgangatho waManzi (i-IWQM) wowama-.

src_text: Three languages will be used in the R5 coin; two languages R2; 50c, 20c and 10c coins and the R1 will be in one language.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente koMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo we-IWQM ukuze uluntu lubonisane.

src_text: All these languages will be used on an annual rotational basis over the next 10 years.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo uya kuthatha indawo yoMgaqo-nkqubo we-WQM ophelelwe lixesha wama-1991 kunye nesicwangciso-qhinga sawo esamiselwa ngo-..

src_text: Draft Integrated Water Quality Management (IWQM) Policy of.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uchaza uluhlu lwemigaqo eya kuba sisiseko solawulo lomgangatho wamanzi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the Draft IWQM Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Uzobonelela ngolungelelwaniso kuyo yonke imithetho efanelekileyo enxulumene namanzi kunye nezibophelelo zelizwe ekuboneleleni nasekulondolozweni kwamanzi njengomthombo onqabileyo.

src_text: The proposed policy will replace the outdated WQM Policy of 1991 and its strategy that was put in place in.
tgt_text: Uyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya.
IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo soMgaqo-nkqubo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: The policy outlines set of principles that will form the basis for water quality management.
tgt_text: Iteknoloji yezonxibelelwano esebenza ngamaza omoya sisixhobo sendalo esibalulekileyo kuhlumo loqoqosho lwedijithali yoMzantsi Afrika kunye nakwisiseko sonxibelelwano.

src_text: It provides an alignment to all the relevant water-related legislation and the country’s global commitments to the provision and conservation of water as scarce resource.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo ujonge ukuxhasa ulwabiwo lwamaza omoya kunye nokukhutshwa kweelayisenisi ezisisigxina zeselula; zosasazo; zenqwelomoya nezaselwandle; zophando nophuhliso; zokufikelela koluntu, kunye nezamanye amashishini afanelekileyo.

src_text: Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ukwajonge ukukhuthaza ulingano kunye nolwabiwo olungenamkhethe ukuze lwenze igalelo kwinguqu yeli candelo kunye nakufikeleleka kuqhagamshelwano lwedijithali nakwiindawo ezikude zelizwe.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy for public comment.
tgt_text: Umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika weManyano yoNxibelelwano lweZizwe ngeZizwe (i-ITU) kunye neBhodi yoLawulo kaNomathotholo .

src_text: Radio frequency spectrum is finite natural resource that is vital to the growth of South Africa’s digital economy and communication infrastructure.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi imamkele umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi yeMimiselo kaNomathotholo (kwiNgingqi  ye-ITU.

src_text: The proposed policy intends to support the spectrum allocation and licensing for fixed mobile; broadcasting; aeronautical and marine; research and development; community access, and other relevant industries.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu ulilungu lebhodi esebenzayo ngoku.

src_text: The policy also seeks to promote equity and fair allocation to contribute towards the transformation of the sector and accessibility of digital connectivity even in outlying parts of the country.
tgt_text: Kwaye kucetywa ukuba aphinde onyulwe kwiBhunga ye-ITU kwixesha lowama-2023 ukuya kowama-..     Unyulo luya kuqhubeka ngexesha leNkomfa yoNozakuzaku ye-ITU eya kubanjelwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania ukusuka ngomhla wama-26 kweyoMsintsi ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: South Africa’s Candidature for the International Telecommunication Union ( ITU) Council and Radio Regulations Board.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika usazibophelele kwiinjongo ze-ITU zokuvala ukwahlukana kwedijithali kunye nokudibanisa bonke abantu behlabathi     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Cabinet approved South Africa’s candidature of Mr Mandla Samuel Mchunu to the ITU Radio Regulations Board (Region .
tgt_text: INyanga yaMafa.

src_text: Mr Mchunu is currently serving board member.
tgt_text: INyanga yaMafa kweyoMsintsi iza kukhunjulwa phantsi komxholo othi: “UkuBhiyozela ilifa lika-Solomon Linda kunye noMculo weMveli waseMzantsi Afrika”.

src_text: He is proposed for re-election to the ITU Council for the term 2023 to.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba basebenzise iNyanga yaMafa ukubhiyozela inkcubeko yethu etyebileyo kunye neyantlukwano enamandla okumanya isizwe sethu.

Sonke kufuneka sizibophelele ekusebenzeni kunye nokuphelisa iyantlukwano nokungabikho kobulungisa obenzeka kwixesha eladlulayo kwaye sikhuthaze ukuzingca ngokuba ngummi waseMzantsi Afrika     Imiyalezo.

src_text: The elections will take place during the ITU Plenipotentiary Conference to be held in Bucharest, Romania from 26 September to 14 October.
tgt_text: Uvuyiswano    IKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi ombulelo kunye neminqweno emihle kwaba balandelayo:Bonke abaphumeleleyo, abaphumelele imbasa kunye nabakhuphisanayo abathathe inxaxheba kumdyarho we-Comrades wama-95, owaziwa njenge “Ultimate Human Race”, ngeCawe, umhla wama-28 kweyeThupha.

src_text: South Africa remains committed to the goals and objectives of the ITU of bridging the digital divide and connecting all the people of the world   Upcoming event.
tgt_text: Ugqatso lwamadoda lwaphunyelelwa ngu-Tete Dijana (kwiiyure ezi-5, imizuzu engama-30, imizuzwana engama-38) osuka e-Mahikeng, eMntla Ntshona ngelixa imbaleki yase-Russia u-Alexandra Morozova (kwiiyure ezi-6, imizuzu eli-17, imizuzwana engama-47) ephumelele ugqatso lwabasetyhini.

src_text: Heritage Month.
tgt_text: Amazwi Ovelwano      IKhabhinethi ivakalise amazwi ovelwano kusapho nezihlobo zika:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), igqala loMzabalazo nokwanguvulindlela wemanyano yabasebenzi owafumana imbasa ye-National Order of Luthuli ngowama-2004 “ngegalelo lakhe kumzabalazo wamalungelo abasebenzi kunye nasekufezekiseni uMzantsi Afrika ongenabuhlanga, ongacaluli ngokwesini, okhululekileyo nonentando yesininzi”.Amagosa amahlanu eNkonzo yesiPolisa yaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SAPS) ebekhwele kwinqwelo-moya ye-SAPS eye yantlitheka kwisikhululo seenqwelo-moya i-Rand Airport, e-Germiston ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kweyeThupha.

src_text: Heritage Month in September will this year be commemorated under the theme: “Celebrating the Legacy of Solomon Linda and South Africa’s Indigenous Music”.
tgt_text: I-SAPS iyaphanda ngale ngozi.

src_text: Cabinet urges all South Africans to use Heritage Month to celebrate our rich cultural heritage and diversity that has the power to unite our nation.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inqwenelele umqhubi wenqwelomoya owenzakeleyo kakhulu ukuba achache ngokukhawuleza     UkuqeshwaZonke izithuba zengqesho zixhomekeke ekuqinisekisweni kwamaphepha ezemfundo kunye nokunye ukuqinisekiswa okafanelekileyo     Nks.

src_text: We must all be committed to working together to eradicate the divisions and injustices of the past and promote conscious sense of being proudly South African   Messages.
tgt_text: Gugulethu Abigail Thimane njengeSekela Mlawuli-Jikelele (i-DDG): ukuHlolwa kweCandelo loLuntu kunye noPhuhliso lweZakhono kwiSebe loCwangciso, uHlolo kunye noVavanyo     Nks.

src_text: CongratulationsCabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to: All winners, medallists and competitors who participated in the 95th Comrades Marathon, popularly known as the “Ultimate Human Race”, on Sunday, 28 August.
tgt_text: Kwena Komape  njenge-DDG: uPhuhliso lwezoQoqosho, uRhwebo kunye neNtengiso kwiSebe lezoLimo, uBuyekezo lwezoMhlaba noPhuhliso lwamaPhandle     Gq.

src_text: The men's race was won by Tete Dijana (5 hrs, 30 min, 38 sec) from Mahikeng in North West while Russian runner Alexandra Morozova (6 hrs, 17 min, 47 sec) won the women’s race.
tgt_text: Bongani Elias Sithole njenge-DDG: Iziko leSizwe loLawulo lweNtlekele kwiSebe loLawulo lweNtsebenziswano.
IKhabhinethi ivume ukuqeshwa kwabalandelayo     Mnu.

src_text: Condolences Cabinet expressed condolences to the family and friends of: Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), the Struggle veteran and pioneering trade unionist  who was also the recipient of the National Order of Luthuli in 2004 for “her lifetime contribution to the struggle for workers’ rights and to the realisation of non-racial, non-sexist, free and democratic South Africa”.The five South African Police Service (SAPS) officers who were passengers onboard the SAPS aircraft that crashed at Rand Airport, Germiston on Tuesday, 30 August.
tgt_text: Songezo  Booi njengeGosa eliyiNtloko lesiGqeba (i-CEO): kwiBhunga leSizwe lokuBhalisa abakhi bezindlu     IBhodi yokuHlola imiGodi eAfrika kunye neQumrhu lezeMali     Mnu.

src_text: The SAPS are investigating the crash.
tgt_text: Zacharias Bernardus Swanepoel (uSihlalo);(ii)    Mnu.

src_text: Cabinet wished the critically injured pilot speedy recovery   Appointment.
tgt_text: Mzwandile Zwelinzima Themba Masondo; kunye no(iii)    Nks.

src_text: All appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and the relevant clearance   Ms Gugulethu Abigail Thimane as Deputy Director-General (DDG): Public Sector Monitoring and Capacity Development at the Department of Planning, Monitoring and Evaluation   Ms Kwena Komape as DDG: Economic Development, Trade and Marketing at the Department of Agriculture, Land Reform and Rural Development..
tgt_text: Phumzile Mthombeni (Mlawuli Jikelele)     Mnu.

src_text: Cabinet concurred with the following appointments   Mr Songezo  Booi as Chief Executive Officer (CEO): National Home Builders Registration Council   Board of African Exploration Mining and Finance Corporation   Mr Zacharias Bernardus Swanepoel (Chairperson);(ii)  Mr Mzwandile Zwelinzima Themba Masondo; and(iii)  Ms Phumzile Mthombeni (Executive Director).
tgt_text: Patrick Dlamini njenge-CEO (Ukwandiswa kweSivumelwano seNgqesho)  ye-Bhanki yoPhuhliso yaseMazantsi e-Afrika.

src_text: Issues in the Environment.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo emfutshane nguMphathiswa wamaShishini kaRhulumente u-Pravin Gordhan malunga namandla ka-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kombane okwethutyana kwaye ikwafumene nengxelo yenkqubela-phambili evela kwiKomiti yobuGcisa yeKomiti yeSizwe yeNgxaki yezaMandla.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed by Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan on the capacity of Eskom to mitigate the intermittent load-shedding and also received progress report from the Technical Committee of the National Energy Crisis Committee.

tgt_text: Ezinye izibhengezo ziza kwenziwa emva kokuqukunjelwa kweengxoxo ezinzulu zezi ngxelo.

src_text: Further announcements will be made following the conclusion of the intensive deliberations of these reports.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukudana ngokuphazamiseka kunye nengxaki ebangelwe kukucima kombane koosomashishini nakumakhaya, ingakumbi okwenzeka ngeli xesha urhulumente eqalisa ukusebenza kwizithembiso ezazenziwe  nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kweyeKhala yowama-.

src_text: Cabinet expressed regret at the disruption and inconvenience caused by load-shedding to businesses and households, particularly happening at the time when government is engaged with the interventions announced by the President in July.

tgt_text: Utyalo-mali.

src_text: Investment.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusungulwa kwe-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, eyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluzizigidi ezingama-350 zeerandi obeluthenjiswe kwiNkomfa yesine yoTyalo-mali yaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SAIC) ebibanjelwe kwiZiko leNgqungquthela laseSandton eRhawutini ngomhla wama-24 kweyoKwindla yowama-..     Eli ziko litsha elizizikwere zeemitha ezingama-62 000 lidibanisa imisebenzi ebiqhutywa ngaphambili kwiindawo ezintlanu ezahlukeneyo kwaye lingangena abasebenzi abamalunga nama-.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the new Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site in Kempton Park, which was part of the R350-million investment pledged at the fourth South Africa Investment Conference (SAIC) held at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesburg on 24 March..
tgt_text: Lelinye lawona maziko e-Sandvik amakhulu  kwihlabathi jikelele nanobuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla kwaye lizawuvelisa iiloli zokulayisha emigodini.

src_text: The new 62 000 square-metre facility consolidates operations previously undertaken at five separate sites and accommodates about 550 employees.
tgt_text: Umyinge ongaphezulu kwama-60% wezi ntsimbi ziza kusetyenziswa xa kusenziwa ezi loli uza kuveliswa apha eMzantsi Afrika..     IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMongameli Ramaphosa lokuya kuhlola KwaZulu-Natal ngethuba kusungulwa komzi-mveliso wakwa-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza ngomhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi yowama-.

src_text: It is one of Sandvik’s biggest and most advanced facilities globally, and has the ability to produce underground loaders with over 60% South African content..
tgt_text: Eli ziko lelinye leeprojekthi ezintlanu zotyalo-mali oluyinkunzi eliyinxalenye yebhiliyonii eyi-.

src_text: Cabinet further welcomed the oversight visit by President Ramaphosa in KwaZulu-Natal during the launch of the Hesto Harnesses manufacturing facility in Stanger, KwaDukuza on 13 September.
tgt_text: 4 yeerandi eyathenjiswa ngabakwa-Metair Investments Limited kumalinge okuxhasa umsebenzi wokwandiswa kunye nokuveliswa apha ekhaya kwe-Ford Ranger etsha.

src_text: This facility is one of five capital investment projects that form part of R. 4-billion commitment by Metair Investments Limited to support the expansion and localisation of the new Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: UMongameli ukwazimase ukuvulwa kweprojekthi yokuphucula nokwandisa i-Sappi Saiccor Mill exabisa iibhiliyoni eziyi-7,7 zeerandi e-Umkomaas, ejolise ekwandiseni nasekuphuculeni le nkampani itsho ikwazi ukukhuphisana kumgangatho wehlabathi  ngelixa ikwadala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo kunye nesisigxina.

src_text: The President also attended the opening of the Sappi Saiccor Mill upgrade and expansion project worth R7,7 billion in Umkomaas, which is aimed at increasing the capacity and global competitiveness of the company while also creating short- and long-term employment opportunities..
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luyinxalenye yezithembiso ezenziwe ngoosomashishini kwi-SAIC.

src_text: These investments form part of pledges made by industrialists at the SAIC.
tgt_text: Lonke utyalo-mali olutsha elizweni lethu lunceda ekwakhiweni ngokutsha nasekuvuseleleni uqoqosho lwethu, kwaye luyaqhubeka nokungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ulilizwe elunamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali.

src_text: Every new investment into our country assists in the reconstruction and recovery of our economy, and continues to profile South Africa as an investment destination of choice.
tgt_text: Uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Infrastructure development.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa kwecandelo elitsha le-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo eliza kwenza kube lula ukuba abantu bahamba-hambe eMusina, likwavumele ukwandiswa kwemisebenzi yorhwebo neyoqoqosho phakathi koMzantsi Afrika kunye namazwe oMbutho woPhuhliso lwaMazantsi e-Afrika (i-SADC).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the new section of the Musina Ring Road in Limpopo that will make it easier for people to move around Musina, and also allow for increased trade and economic activity between South Africa and the Southern African Development Community countries.
tgt_text: Le projekthi yezigidi ezingama-640 zeerandi idale imisebenzi esisigxina engama-275 yabahlali bale ngingqi yaze yabonelela ngamathuba kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni nakumashishini amancinane, aphakathi namancinane kakhulu (ii-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwe-Musina Ring Road yinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yeziseko zophuhliso, ngokusebenzisa i-ERRP, ejonge ukudala uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye namathuba engqesho kumacandelo ahlukeneyo nakuluntu.

src_text: The R640-million project created over 275 full-time jobs for locals and provided opportunities for local communities and small, medium and micro enterprises (SMMEs)..
tgt_text: Intlekele yaseJagersfontein.

src_text: The construction of the Musina Ring Road is part of government’s infrastructure programme, through the ERRP, that seeks to create inclusive growth and employment opportunities across various sectors and communities.
tgt_text: 1  IKhabhinethi ithi mazilale ngenxeba iintsapho zabo bathe basutywa kukufa emva kokugqabhuka kwedama lodaka lomgodi owavalwayo  wase-Jagersfontein e-Freystata lakhupha udaka olwenze umonakalo omkhulu ngentseni yangeCawa, umhla we-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Jagersfontein disaster.
tgt_text: Le ntlekele iphinde yashiya izakhiwo zendawo, izinto zabantu ezifana nezithuthi kunye nezindlu ezininzi zonakaliswe kakhulu.. 2   Ngethuba lotyelelo lwakhe kummandla wentlekele ngoMvulo, umhla we-12 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, uMongameli Ramaphosa uvakalise umbulelo ngeenzame zohlangulo nezovuselelo kulo mmandla.

src_text: 1 Cabinet expressed its sincere condolences to the families of those who lost their lives after the tailings of an abandoned local mine in Jagersfontein in the Free State burst open and released disastrous mudslide around dawn on Sunday, 11 September.
tgt_text: Ukwathembise ukuba urhulumente uzakubonelela ngenkxaso efanelekileyo kubahlali abachaphazelekayo baseJagersfontein.

src_text: The disaster also left the local infrastructure, personal properties such as vehicles and several homes severely damaged.. 2 During his visit to the disaster area on Monday, 12 September 2022, President Ramaphosa expressed appreciation for the rescue and recovery efforts being undertaken in the area.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhuthazekile kukuba abanini balo mgodi bathe bakulungele ukunika uncedo lobugcisa nenkxaso kurhulumente ukuba banokucelwa benze njalo liBhunga lezeZimbiwa laseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: He also pledged that government will provide the necessary support to the affected residents of Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: 3 Ishishini lezemigodi lisahleli linegalelo elibalulekileyo kuqoqosho ngokuqeshwa ngokuthe ngqo nangokungathanga ngqo, iingeniso evela kurhwebo namazwe angaphandle, kunye notyalo-mali oluthe ngqo lwangaphandle, kwaye lidlala indima ebalulekileyo ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu kwiindawo ezinemigodi.

src_text: Cabinet is encouraged that the owners of the mine have said that they are ready to provide technical assistance and support to the government should it be requested by the Minerals Council South Africa.
tgt_text: 4 Urhulumente kunye neminye imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente baye bangenelela ngokungxamisekileyo ngokubonelela ngeendawo zokuhlala ezingxamisekileyo, ululeko lwengqondo nangezibonelelo ezingundoqo ezifana neengubo, oomatrasi kunye nokutya.

src_text: 3 The mining industry remains significant contributor to the economy through direct and indirect employment, export earnings, and foreign direct investment, and plays crucial role in improving the lives of people in mining communities.
tgt_text: Ubonelelo lwamanzi nombane kulo mmandla sele lubuyele esiqhelweni.

src_text: 4 Government and some non-governmental organisations intervened urgently by providing emergency shelter, trauma counselling and basic provisions such as blankets, mattresses and food parcels.
Water supply and electricity in the area have since been restored.
tgt_text: 5 Nje ukuba indawo yentlekele icociwe, amagcisa alindeleke ukuba enze uhlolo lweendonga zezindlu.
IKhabhinethi ibulele iinkonzo zikaxakeka, imibutho yoluntu kunye namalungu oluntu ngeminikelo yesisa noncedo lwabo.

src_text: 5 Once the disaster site has been cleaned up, technicians are expected to undertake structural assessments of houses.
tgt_text: Uqoqosho.

src_text: Cabinet thanked emergency services, civil-society organisations and members of the public for their generous contributions and assistance.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixoxe ngobume boqoqosho beli lizwe emva kokuba amanani akutshanje eZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) abonise ukuba ingeniso yemveliso yelizwe (i-GDP) yekota yesibini yowama-2022 yehle ngo-0,7%.

src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: Izinto eziphembelele oku kwehla ziquka ukucinywa kombane, ungquzulwano lwaseRashiya ne-Ukraine, kunye neendleko eziphezulu zokuphila kunye nokunyuka kwamaxabiso.

src_text: Cabinet deliberated on the state of the economy in the country after Statistics South Africa’s (Stats SA) recent figures showed that the gross domestic product (GDP) for the second quarter of 2022 decreased by 0,7%.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela enziwe siSicwangciso soKwakha ngokutsha kunye noVuselelo loQoqosho (i-ERRP) ubukhulu becala sithintele ilizwe kubunzima amashishini ajamelane nabo kwihlabathi, kwaye sakhusela imisebenzi kunye neendlela zokuphila.

src_text: Factors which influenced this decrease included load-shedding, the Russia-Ukraine conflict, and the high cost of living and inflation.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela ezoqoqosho aluqilima karhulumente aqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo, njengoko kungqinwe kwiziphumo zakutshanje ze-Stats SA zeKota zoVavanyo lwaBasebenzi, ezibonise ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala neyesibini yowama-     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: The interventions made by the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) have largely cushioned the country from the international headwinds, and also protected jobs and livelihoods.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo soBeko-liso noVavanyo (i-M&E) soMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha lweSizwe (i-NYP).

src_text: Government’s strong economic interventions are beginning to bear fruit, as evidenced in Stats SA’s recent Quarterly Labour Force Survey results, which showed that over 648 000 jobs were gained between the first and second quarters of  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume isicwangciso-nkqubo se-M&E esiza kunceda ukubeka iliso okusebenzayo kunye novavanyo lweempembelelo zeentsika ze-NYP yowama-2020 ukuya kowama-.

src_text: Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) Framework for the National Youth Policy (NYP).
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngezalathisi ezintlanu ezikwinqanaba eliphezulu ezihambelana neentsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Cabinet approved the M&E framework that will enable the effective monitoring and impact assessment of the pillars of the NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Ezi zalathisi zaqulunqwa kubanjiswene namahlakaniafanelekileyo anomdla kuphuhliso nasekuxhotyisweni kolutsha kweli lizwe.

src_text: The framework provides five high-level indicators which are aligned with the pillars of the NYP.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha eziza kuqokelelwa ziza kujonga iminyaka yobudala, isini, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga ngokwebala kunye nendawo yokuhlala ngokwemimmandla yala mangenelelo..     Ukubeka iliso kuza kwenziwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente, kumaqumrhu nakumacandelo abucala.

src_text: The indicators were developed with the relevant stakeholders who have an interest in the development and empowerment of youth in the country.
tgt_text: Iingxelo ziza kwenziwa ngekota kwaye zipapashwe kabini ngonyaka..     Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo.

src_text: The data collection will be disaggregated in terms of age, gender, disability, racial grouping and the geographic setting of these interventions..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo kurhulumente, esijonge ukulungisa izikhewu eziboniweyo zocwangciso lomgaqo-nkqubo kwinkqubo yocwangciso yangoku.

src_text: The monitoring will be done in all spheres of government, entities and the private sector.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela acetywayo phakathi kwezinye izinto aza kujongana nokunqongophala kolungelelwaniso locwangciso phakathi kwamanqanaba amathathu karhulumente.

src_text: The reports will be generated quarterly and published twice year..  Policy Framework for Integrated Planning.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela azo kuqalisa indlela yokubeka iliso esekelwe kubungqina.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the Policy Framework for Integrated Planning in government, which seeks to address the identified policy planning gaps in the current planning system.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo somgaqo-nkqubo sikwazisa ukuqikelelwa lula ngocwangciso lwexesha elide ukuya kwixesha eliphakathi kunye nelexesha elifutshane kurhulumente wonke.

src_text: The proposed interventions will amongst others deal with the lack of planning alignment within the three spheres of government.
tgt_text: Siza kusebenzela ukwazisa uhlaziyo lwemithetho ukuze kuphuculwe ukuhambelana nokuqikelelwa kucwangciso kunye nokubekwa kweliso kukarhulumente..     Ukuvunywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-Arhente yaMayeza ase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: The interventions will introduce an evidence-based monitoring mechanism.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukutyikitywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-AMA kunye nokungeniswa kwaso ePalamente ukuze sivunywe.

src_text: The policy framework also introduces easier predictability with long to medium and short-term planning across government.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuzalisekisa isivumelwano esamkelwa yiNdibano yeManyano ye-Afrika ngowama-.

src_text: It will work towards introducing legislative reforms to improve coherency and predictability in government planning and monitoring..
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano siseka ngokusesikweni i-AMA yeli lizwekazi.

src_text: Ratification of the Treaty for the Establishment of the African Medicines Agency (AMA).
tgt_text: I-arhente iza kulawula amayeza onyango, kwaye iphucule ukhuseleko kunye nokusebenza kwamayeza onyango kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Cabinet approved the signing of the Treaty for the Establishment of the AMA and its submission to Parliament for ratification.
tgt_text: Ukutyikitya kunye nokuvunywa kungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika uzibophelele kwizivumelwano zeli lizwekazi nezehlabathi malunga nokuphucula imithetho yeli lizwekazi elawula iimveliso zalo zempilo..     Ingxelo ngokuSebenza kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu yoPhando noPhuhliso (i-R&D) – yowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu ye-R&D kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo (ngowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/21).

src_text: This will give effect to the treaty that was adopted by the African Union Assembly in.
tgt_text: Oku kuhambelana necandelo 11D (17) loMthetho weRhafu yeNgeniso, wowe-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 wowe-1962), elifuna ukuba ezi ngxelo zandlalwe ePalamente.

src_text: The treaty formally establishes the AMA for the continent.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yesibonelelo serhafu ijonge ukukhuthaza iinkampani zabucala ukuba zityale imali kwi-R&D ukuze zikhuthaze ukukhula kotyalo-mali.

src_text: The agency will regulate medical products, and improve the safety and efficacy of the medical products for the continent.
tgt_text: Ivumela ukuqhubela-phambili kwenzululwazi kunye nobuchule bokuyilaobuza kunceda ekukhuleni koqoqosho, kwaye ikhuthaza ukhuphiswano.

src_text: The signing and ratifying of this treaty will advance South Africa’s global and continental commitment toward strengthening the continental regulatory system on its health products..  Report on the Performance of the Research and Development (R&D) Tax Incentive Programme – 2019/20 and 2020/.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba le ngxelo ibonisa ukuba iinkampani ezintsha zifake izicelo zokufumana isibonelelo serhafu.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the R&D Tax incentive Programme for the past two years (2019/20 and 2020/21).
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza iinkampani ezininzi ukuba zifake izicelo zokuxhamla esi sibonelelo njengenxalenye yokukhulisa utyalo-mali lwazo kunye nokukhwezela ukukhula koqoqosho.

src_text: This is in line with section 11D (17) of the Income Tax Act, 1962 (Act 58 1962), which requires the tabling of these reports in Parliament.
tgt_text: Iinkampani ezine eziphezulu ezithe zasifumana esi sibonelelo serhafu zikwicandelo lokucola iimveliso zolimo; elezokuxhamlisa kwizimbiwa; elezamichiza, elezithambiso, elezamayeza kunye nelezobugcisa bezombane kunye nelezobuchwepheshe bolwazi ethe iKhabhinethi yawamkela njengemacandelo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kwisiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMgaqo-nkqubo wezoShishino.

src_text: The tax incentive programme seeks to encourage private companies to invest in R&D so as to stimulate investment growth.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo inokufumaneka kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye noBuchule bokuYila:  www.dst.gov.za..     IQonga loMthetho lokuKhula kunye namaThuba ase-Afrika (i-AGOA) – yowama-.

src_text: It enables the advancement of science and innovation towards economic growth, and promotes competitiveness.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweQonga le-AGOA ngowama-.

src_text: Cabinet is pleased that the report shows that new companies have applied for the tax incentive.
tgt_text: I-AGOA yaphunyezwa yiMelika (i-USA) ngowama-2000 ukuze yenze kube lula kumazwe amaninzi ase-Afrika akumazantsi e-Sahara ukurhweba ne-USA.

src_text: It encourages more companies to access this scheme as part of growing their respective investment and stimulating economic growth.
tgt_text: Iimveliso zorhwebo zoMzantsi Afrika ezithunyelwa e-USA phantsi kwe-AGOA ziquka iziqhamo ezityiwayo, amandongomane, izithuthi, iintsimbi zemoto, intsimbi, isinyithi kunye neemveliso zemichiza.

src_text: The top-four companies that accessed the tax incentive are in agro-processing; mining beneficiation; chemicals, cosmetics, pharmaceutical and electro-technical and Information Technology sectors that Cabinet endorsed as priority areas in the Industrial Policy Action Plan.
tgt_text: Owona mhla nendawo zisaza kubhengezwa.

src_text: The full report can be accessed through the Department of Science and Innovation website: www.dst.gov.za..  African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA) Forum –.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO) –.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the hosting of the AGOA Forum in.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNgqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-GEO eKapa ngowama-.

src_text: AGOA was enacted by the United States of America (USA) in 2000 to provide unilateral trade preferential access for most of the sub-Saharan African countries and the USA domestic market.
tgt_text: I-GEO liqumrhu eliphakathi koorhulumente elasekwa ngowama-2003 emva kweNgqungquthela yeHlabathi yowama-2002 yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo.

src_text: South Africa’s exports under AGOA include edible fruits, nuts, vehicles, auto components, iron, steel and chemical products.
tgt_text: Isebenza njengeqonga lamazwe ngamazwe apho amazwe anikela ngokuzithandela kwinjongo enye yokwakha iinkqubo ze-GEO.

src_text: The actual date and venue are still to be announced.
tgt_text: I-GEO ngoku inoorhulumente bamazwe abangaphezulu kwe-113, abangama-30 kubo bavela e-Afrika kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba emalunga ne-140, kwaye i-11 lale mibutho livela e-Afrika.
